Description: Covenant Hospice Inc., a non-profit, agreed to pay $10,149,374 to reimburse the government for alleged overbilling of Medicare, Tricare and Medicaid for hospice services.

Covenant Hospice agreed to pay $552,255 to Alabama and Florida for alleged overbilling for hospice services. This was part of a $10.1 million settlement involving the federal government; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/-covenant-hospice-inc
